title: Twitter reacts to Joanna Jedrzejczyk's dominant win over Michelle Waterson at UFC on ESPN+ 19
text:
Joanna Jedrzejczyk returned to the strawweight division with a win on Saturday when she defeated Michelle Waterson in the UFC on ESPN+ 19 headliner.

After a failed title bid up a weight class, Jedrzejczyk (16-3 MMA, 10-3 UFC) dropped down to the division where she once held UFC gold. She put herself in contention to fight for the belt with a one-sided unanimous decision win over Waterson (17-7 MMA, 5-3 UFC) in the main event matchup, which took place at Amalie Arena in Tampa, Fla., and streamed on ESPN+.

Check below for the top Twitter reactions to Jedrzejczyk’s victory over Waterson at UFC on ESPN+ 19.

* * * *

At long last: 13 down, just one to go. It’s the #UFCTampa main event between former women’s strawweight champion Joanna Jedrzejczyk (@JoannaMMA) and Michelle Waterson (@KarateHottieMMA). Who are you picking? https://t.co/H5NuiGXmV5 pic.twitter.com/T5lHc6Ui6z — MMA Junkie (@MMAjunkie) October 13, 2019

The size and strength advantage for Jędrzejczyk is too much for Waterson thus far. Not surprising since Waterson is a former atomweight and Jędrzejczyk recently fought at flyweight. #UFCTampa — Rob Tatum (@RobTatum303) October 13, 2019

Jedrzejczyk has used her size advantage well. — Heidi Fang (@HeidiFang) October 13, 2019

Jedrzejczyk showing glimpses of new tricks/feels from the clinch, but is ultimately getting her head and frame game going, which is bad news for Waterson. #UFCTampa — Dan Tom (@DanTomMMA) October 13, 2019

Joanna is still really really good, guys. — caposa (@Grabaka_Hitman) October 13, 2019

Gah size difference is too much. 😢 — Cynthia Vance (@cynthiavance) October 13, 2019

Crazy to think this fight almost didn’t happen during fight week . This is a good fight so far #UFCTampa — Derek Brunson (@DerekBrunson) October 13, 2019

Michelle Waterson needs an answer for Joanna Jedrzejczyk's urgently. Paths to victory shrinking at a rapid rate for her after two rounds. #UFCTampa — Mike Bohn (@MikeBohnMMA) October 13, 2019

Waterson getting broken down here… glad a veteran ref is in there as opposed to the official they had assigned for the Gifford-Davis fight. #UFCTampa — Dan Tom (@DanTomMMA) October 13, 2019

This has been a good night for fighters taking beatings on the feet. Or bad night, if you're one of those fighters. #UFCTampa — jim genia (@jim_genia) October 13, 2019

…are those the first takedowns and submission attempt of Joanna’s UFC career? #UFCTampa — David BixenSP🎃🎃KY (@davidbix) October 13, 2019

This is a vintage Joanna Jedrzejczyk performance. When she’s fighting like this, JJ is difficult to beat at strawweight. #UFCTampa — Marc Raimondi (@marc_raimondi) October 13, 2019

30-27 Joanna despite the late round submission scare. — Aaron Bronsteter (@aaronbronsteter) October 13, 2019

That did nothing but piss her off — Belal Muhammad (@bullyb170) October 13, 2019

Fantastic reaction from Waterson to get that position, but Jedrzejczyk looks to make her pay at the end. Wow. #UFCTampa — Dan Tom (@DanTomMMA) October 13, 2019

That front kick from Waterson isn’t doing anything to Joanna — not should it. She needs to abandon it.#UFCTampa — Phil Murphy (@Phil_Sports) October 13, 2019

Waterson's front kick is one of the most useless strikes I've ever seen. — Lucas Bourdon (@lucas_bourdon) October 13, 2019

Respect to Waterson, she has the samurai spirit.#UFCTampa — John Wayne Makdessi (@JohnMakdessi) October 13, 2019

Joana’s right foot look really bad #UFCTampa — Rafael dos Anjos (@RdosAnjosMMA) October 13, 2019

Every time Michelle gets elbowed across her face, my eyes tear up… #UFCTampa — Mike Jackson, Esq. (@TheTruthJackson) October 13, 2019

Waterson is so damn tough. But man, Joanna has her surrounded skull-wise. — Ben Fowlkes (@benfowlkesMMA) October 13, 2019

That 🦶😳 — Amanda Nunes (@Amanda_Leoa) October 13, 2019

Joanna Contender’s right foot is definitely broken. #UFCTampa — Michael Chiesa (@MikeMav22) October 13, 2019

Michelle keeps throwing that worthless front kick like why she’s not even trying to land it! — Mike "Biggie" Rhodes (@TeamRocBiggie) October 13, 2019

Zhang Li vs JJ sign me up ! #UFC — Derek Brunson (@DerekBrunson) October 13, 2019

Nice fight ladies! Way to finish the card. 🙏🏼 — Nina Ansaroff (@NinaAnsaroff) October 13, 2019
description: See the top Twitter reactions to Joanna Jedrzejczyk's win over Michelle Waterson in the UFC on ESPN+ 19 main event.
